contentList.content: Long ago, the boundaries between worlds began to blur. In the Forgotten Realms, an ancient power stirred—a mysterious force known as the Nexus. From this convergence of dimensions emerged legendary Heroes drawn from distant lands.
Weapon Attacks now have a 25% chance to trigger a splash effect in a small area, dealing 1d10 Piercing damage to the primary target.
Shoots a penetrating projectile that deals damage to targets and knocks them back.
All nearby allies can use their reaction to make one weapon attack.
Regain 1d10 + level + Constitution Modifier amount of Hit Points.
The next time damage would reduce the affected entity to 0 hit points, it remains conscious with Level plus Constitution Modifier hit point left.
Charge forward and attack the first enemy in your way. The target may be stunned.
Pick up an item or creature and use it to make a melee attack. The target may be stunned.
When you heal another creature, it gains resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.
Has Resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.
Release a wave of light to heal allies and damage enemies.
Heals the target and restores half of the healed amount to yourself.
When you kill a hostile creature, you gain Temporary Hit Points.
Gained temporary hit points equal to its Constitution Modifier and Level combined.
Unlock Penetrating Round, Inspire, Adrenaline Rush.
Unlock Shadow Charge, Fire Hands, Overpower.
Unlock Holy Light, Holy Radiance, Hammer of Justice.
Unlock Ravage, Impaling Blades, Primal Grasp.
Summons thorns that grow from the ground, dealing damage. The target may be stunned.
Deals damage to the enemy and pulls them in.
Leap down unto a foe, knocking them Prone.
Melee weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 cold damage. You Have Resistance to Cold Damage.
Unlock Death Coil, Howling Blast, Frozen Tempest.
Deals cold damage and may freeze the target.
Emits an aura that deals cold damage to nearby enemies.
Melee Unarmed Attacks now have a 25% chance to deal 1d10 Bludgeoning damage to the target.
Unlock Radiant Dash, Breath of Heaven, Deadly Reach.
Dash quickly to the target. Heals if the target is an ally, and deals damage if the target is an enemy.
Heal yourself and all nearby allies and increase their movement speed.
It strikes the enemy with a hammer, potentially stunning them.
It delivers a fierce four-hit combo to deal damage.
Fires a corrupted essence to deal damage.
It emits fire from your hands, dealing damage to the front.
When a melee weapon attack hits, you regain 1d4 hit points.
Charge forward and attack all enemies in your way.
While you are in an area that is Lightly or Heavily Obscured, you gain the Invisible condition against any creature.
Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit.
When you deal damage to an enemy, there is a 25% chance to restore a small amount of Hit Points.
Unlock Chain Lightning, Feral Spirit, Windfury.
Gain a disengange and movement speed boost. You can use a Windfury Strike, hitting with your weapon three times.
While you are in an area that is Lightly or Heavily Obscured, you gain the Invisible condition against any creature.
Unlock Snipe, Pinning Shot, Holo Decoy.
Unlock Flamestrike, Living Bomb, Gravity Lapse.
Make a creature to fall Prone on its turn.
Your AC increases by 2. When using ETC's skill, your AC increases by 2 for 3 turns. You gain proficiency with a musical instrument.
Unlock Power Slide, Face Melt, Guitar Solo.

Elite Tauren Chieftain (E.T.C.), the Rock God, is a melee Tank Hero from the Warcraft universe. The Power of the Horde incarnated by brutal rhythms and blistering guitar riffs into the form of the most elite Tauren chieftain to ever headbang across the surface of Azeroth. Don't bother putting on socks. He's just going to rock them off anyways.

Jim Raynor, the Renegade Commander, is a Ranged Assassin Hero from the StarCraft universe. The Ex-Confederate Marshall has stood against whatever the universe can throw at him and survived. He stands as a bright beacon of hope among enigmatic aliens and monsters, still fighting for justice in a cold uncaring universe.

Diablo, the Lord of Terror, is a melee Tank Hero from the Diablo universe. Known in the ancient tongue as Al'Diabolos, the Prime Evil of Terror, the Demon Lord Diablo seeks to claim the world of Sanctuary for the Burning Hells. His victims are innumerable, his schemes unknowable, and his power... unfathomable.

Uther the Lightbringer is a melee Healer Hero from the Warcraft universe. The first paladin and founder of the Order of the Silver Hand, Uther is a faithful servant of the Light. Dispensing justice with the swing of his hammer, Uther is a bastion of truth and an unflinching symbol of the Alliance.

Sarah Kerrigan, the Queen of Blades, is a Melee Assassin Hero from the StarCraft universe. Once a Terran Ghost with formidable psionic abilities, Sarah Kerrigan was betrayed by her allies and transformed by the zerg into the Queen of Blades. Now freed of the dark one's corruption, Kerrigan faces a threat that could destroy the galaxy itself.

Arthas Menethil, the Lich King, is a melee Tank Hero from the Warcraft universe. Once the crown prince of Lordaeron, and protégé of Uther the Lightbringer, Arthas was corrupted by the cursed blade Frostmourne in a bid to save his people. Now he rules over the damned as the Lich King and all shall know his wrath.

Kharazim, the Veradani Monk, is a melee Healer Hero from the Diablo universe. To the monks of Ivgorod, the gods are in all things, and their divine will is proclaimed by the Patriarchs. With unshakable faith, Kharazim carries forth the decrees of the thousand and one gods to the ends of Sanctuary and the realms beyond.

Illidan Stormrage, the Betrayer, is a Melee Assassin Hero from the Warcraft universe. The first demon hunter betrayed his people by creating a new Well of Eternity after the demonic invasion of Azeroth. Now Illidan lords over the realm of Outland, slaughtering unsuitably prepared heroes who venture into his domain.

Zeratul, the Dark Prelate, is a Melee Assassin Hero from the StarCraft universe. The enigmatic Dark Templar faithfully serves the Xel'Naga. While he expertly wields the powers of the Void, it is his wisdom that earns him the respect of the Koprulu sector's greatest leaders - despite his penchant for dramatic entrances.

Thrall, the Warchief of the Horde, is a melee Bruiser Hero from the Warcraft universe. As a child, he served the cruel Aedelas Blackmoore as a slave. After gaining his freedom, he guided the liberated orcs to a land of their own, and worked to recover their ancient traditions.

November "Nova" Terra, the Dominion Ghost, is a Ranged Assassin Hero from the StarCraft universe. She is a ghost of the Terran Dominion and one of the most powerful psionic soldiers ever known. Nova is highly focused, determined, and extremely deadly. Even Jim Raynor wouldn't want to be caught within her crosshairs.

Kael'thas Sunstrider, the Sun King, is a Ranged Assassin Hero from the Warcraft universe. Like all Blood Elves, Prince Kael'thas was transformed by the fall of Quel'thalas. Desperate to save his people from being consumed by their magical addiction, he joined forces with the Burning Legion and now lords over Tempest Keep.

Tyrael, the Archangel of Justice, is a melee Tank Hero from the Diablo universe. Among the angels it is the Archangel of Justice who is humanity's greatest defender. Wielding his sword El'druin against the Burning Hells, the Prime Evils would have enslaved Sanctuary and all of humanity long ago if Tyrael had not intervened.
Charge forward and attack enemies in your way, possibly pushing them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OFF_BALANCED">Off Balance</LSTag>.
Once per turn, when you deal damage to an enemy, you gain Wrath for 2 turns.
Unlock Ancient Spear, Seismic Slam, Whirlwind.

Sonya, the Wandering Barbarian, is a melee Bruiser Hero from the Diablo universe. From the frozen Dreadlands of the north come the mighty Barbarian warriors. After surviving the destruction of her home and death of her tribe, Sonya wanders Sanctuary in search of battle and a better life for her people.
You deal piercing damage to an enemy and move to its location.
Channel your mettlesome strength and strike all creatures in the area.
Channel your mettlesome strength and strike all creatures in the area.

Johanna, the Crusader of Zakarum, is a melee Tank Hero from the Diablo universe. There have been many women who have borne the name Johanna in service of the crusade, and each has given her life to purify her faith. Johanna carries on their legacy as she searches the kingdom of Khanduras for the fallen star.
Pull anything and anyone into you [1].
